title: Hailey Bieber scratches the wheels of husband Justin's pink Lamborghini
text:
What a way to round off the week.

This Friday, four days after their wedding in South Carolina, Hailey Baldwin scratched the wheels of her new husband Justin Bieber's pink Lamborghini.

Justin, 25, posted Insta Stories footage of himself playfully moaning about the damage to his 2019 Urus as his bride pulled a pout.

Whoops: This Friday, four days after their Christian wedding in South Carolina, Hailey Baldwin scratched the rims of her new husband Justin Bieber's pink Lamborghini

'What did you do? What did you do? Aww, man,' he groaned, as Hailey apologized with a smile and insisted she could 'fix it.'

As Hailey squatted to observe the scratch, Justin said: 'You think you're freakin' cute and you have pigtails,' laughing and playing with her hair.

Their latest escapade comes a day after Justin released a romantic new single with Dan + Shay called 10,000 Hours - a number he tweeted was 'Wedding music.'

There it is: Justin made sure his followers got a good look at the damage

Taking it in stride: 'What did you do? What did you do? Aww, man,' he groaned, as Hailey apologized with a smile and insisted she could 'fix it.'

Then this Friday, Justin and Hailey co-starred in both the 10,000 music video and an underwear campaign with Calvin Klein.

Kendall Jenner, A$AP Rocky and Troye Sivan were also featured in the campaign, which was rolled out in honor of the brand's 50th birthday.

Hailey, who has been sporting a $500,000 new Tiffany engagement ring, had a courthouse wedding with Justin in New York last September.

'Aww': Justin, 25, posted Insta Stories footage of himself playfully moaning about the damage to his 2019 Urus as his bride pulled a pout

However, the pair of devoted Christians were set on an ecclesiastical wedding too and held a ceremony at the Montage Palmetto Bluff's Somerset Chapel.

Their 150-strong guest list included a string of celebrities such as Kylie and Kendall Jenner, Usher and Jaden Smith - as well as various Baldwins.

Shortly after his last breakup from his on-off flame Selena Gomez last year, Justin and Hailey had whirlwind romance and he proposed that summer in the Bahamas.
description: This Friday, four days after their wedding in South Carolina, Hailey Baldwin scratched the wheels of her new husband Justin Bieber 's pink Lamborghini.
